verses.text: \w Say|strong="H3478"\w* \w ye|strong="H3808"\w* \w unto|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* brethren, \w Ammi|strong="H5971"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H1961"\w* sisters, Ruhamah.

Plead \w with|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* mother, plead; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wife, \w neither|strong="H4480"\w* am \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* husband: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H7760"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* whoredoms \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* face, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* adulteries \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w between|strong="H4480"\w* \w her|strong="H7760"\w* breasts;

lest \w I|strong="H5971"\w* strip her naked, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* set her \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H5971"\w* day \w that|strong="H5971"\w* she \w was|strong="H5971"\w* born, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* make her \w as|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* wilderness, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* set her \w like|strong="H5971"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* dry land, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* slay her \w with|strong="H5971"\w* thirst;

\w Yea|strong="H3588"\w*, \w upon|strong="H6440"\w* \w her|strong="H5493"\w* children \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* mercy; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* children \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w whoredom|strong="H2183"\w*.

\w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H7760"\w* mother hath played \w the|strong="H3205"\w* harlot: she \w that|strong="H3117"\w* conceived \w them|strong="H7760"\w* hath \w done|strong="H7760"\w* shamefully: \w for|strong="H3117"\w* she said, \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3117"\w* go \w after|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* lovers, \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w give|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* bread \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* water, \w my|strong="H7760"\w* wool \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* flax, \w mine|strong="H7760"\w* oil \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* drink.

\w Therefore|strong="H3588"\w*, \w behold|strong="H3808"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* hedge \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H1121"\w* way \w with|strong="H1121"\w* thorns, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1121"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* fence against \w her|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w find|strong="H7355"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* paths.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w follow|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* lovers, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* overtake \w them|strong="H5414"\w*; \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* seek \w them|strong="H5414"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w not|strong="H5414"\w* \w find|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*: \w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w shall|strong="H4325"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* say, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H3212"\w* return \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* first husband; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w then|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H4325"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* better \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3651"\w* \w she|strong="H3651"\w* \w did|strong="H3651"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* know \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* gave \w her|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* corn, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* wine, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* oil, \w and|strong="H1870"\w* multiplied \w unto|strong="H1870"\w* \w her|strong="H4672"\w* silver \w and|strong="H1870"\w* gold, which \w they|strong="H3651"\w* used \w for|strong="H3651"\w* Baal.

\w Therefore|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* corn \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H6258"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* wine \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* season thereof, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* pluck \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* wool \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H1245"\w* flax \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* covered \w her|strong="H4672"\w* nakedness.

\w And|strong="H3701"\w* \w now|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* discover \w her|strong="H5414"\w* lewdness \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* sight \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* lovers, \w and|strong="H3701"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w mine|strong="H3045"\w* \w hand|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H7725"\w* \w also|strong="H6256"\w* \w cause|strong="H3651"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* mirth \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w cease|strong="H7725"\w*, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w new|strong="H8492"\w* moons, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* sabbaths, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H5337"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w solemn|strong="H4150"\w* \w assemblies|strong="H4150"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w lay|strong="H1540"\w* waste \w her|strong="H1540"\w* vines \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w* fig trees, whereof \w she|strong="H3808"\w* \w hath|strong="H3027"\w* said, These \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* hire \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H5337"\w* lovers \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w given|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5337"\w*: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w will|strong="H5869"\w* \w make|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* forest, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* field \w shall|strong="H5869"\w* eat \w them|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4150"\w* \w I|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H7673"\w* visit upon \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H2282"\w* \w of|strong="H2282"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Baalim, unto \w which|strong="H2282"\w* \w she|strong="H2320"\w* burned incense; when \w she|strong="H2320"\w* decked herself \w with|strong="H4150"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* earrings \w and|strong="H4150"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* jewels, \w and|strong="H4150"\w* went after \w her|strong="H3605"\w* lovers, \w and|strong="H4150"\w* forgat \w me|strong="H3605"\w*, saith \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

Therefore, behold, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H5414"\w* allure \w her|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* wilderness, \w and|strong="H7704"\w* speak comfortably \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* give \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* vineyards \w from|strong="H5921"\w* thence, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* valley \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Achor \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* door \w of|strong="H3068"\w* hope: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H6485"\w* answer \w there|strong="H1992"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* youth, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w she|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H3068"\w* \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Egypt.

\w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3820"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* day, \w saith|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w thou|strong="H1696"\w* shalt call \w me|strong="H5921"\w* Ishi; \w and|strong="H3212"\w* shalt call \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H1696"\w* \w more|strong="H3651"\w* Baali.

\w For|strong="H4714"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H4714"\w* \w take|strong="H5927"\w* \w away|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* names \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* Baalim \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w her|strong="H5414"\w* mouth, \w and|strong="H6030"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3117"\w* \w no|strong="H5414"\w* more \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w mentioned|strong="H5927"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* name.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* covenant \w for|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* beasts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* field, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* fowls \w of|strong="H3068"\w* heaven, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* creeping \w things|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* ground: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w break|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* bow \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* sword \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w battle|strong="H3117"\w* \w out|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w lie|strong="H1961"\w* \w down|strong="H7121"\w* safely.

\w And|strong="H6310"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* betroth thee \w unto|strong="H6310"\w* \w me|strong="H5493"\w* \w for|strong="H8034"\w* \w ever|strong="H3808"\w*; yea, \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3808"\w* betroth thee \w unto|strong="H6310"\w* \w me|strong="H5493"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* righteousness, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* judgment, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* lovingkindness, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w in|strong="H5493"\w* mercies.

\w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H2719"\w* even betroth \w thee|strong="H3772"\w* \w unto|strong="H3117"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* faithfulness: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w thou|strong="H3117"\w* shalt know \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4941"\w* \w it|strong="H4941"\w* \w shall|strong="H2617"\w* \w come|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H4941"\w* pass \w in|strong="H4941"\w* \w that|strong="H5769"\w* day, I \w will|strong="H6664"\w* answer, saith \w the|strong="H4941"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, I \w will|strong="H6664"\w* answer \w the|strong="H4941"\w* heavens, \w and|strong="H4941"\w* they \w shall|strong="H2617"\w* answer \w the|strong="H4941"\w* earth;

\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* earth \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* corn, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wine, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* oil; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w answer|strong="H3045"\w* Jezreel.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* wilt sow \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6030"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w earth|strong="H8064"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* obtained \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* say \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w which|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H1931"\w*, \w Thou|strong="H1961"\w* \w art|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H1931"\w*; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* say, \add Thou art \add*\w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.
